content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -80)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) and a furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
-  Transport belt at position (39.5, -83.5) and transport belt at position (40.5, -83.5) connected to the burner mining drill
-  Burner inserter at position (39.5, -79.5) connected to the furnace and transport belt
-  Burner inserter at position (41.5, -78.5) connected to the furnace

### Electricity generator at position(117, -30)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), offshore pump (position (106.5, -32.5)) and small electric poles
-  Pipe group (fluid system 215157) connecting the offshore pump to the boiler
-  Pipe group (fluid system 215152) connecting the boiler to the steam engine
-  Electricity group (id 614486) connecting the steam engine to the small electric poles

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
-  Ensure the correct number of arguments are passed to the connect_entities function
-  Make sure the positions passed to the connect_entities function are integers, not floats

### Errors when using get_entity function
-  Ensure the position object passed to the get_entity function does not have a 'position' attribute

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the entity can be placed at the target position before attempting to place it

### NAMESPACE
*   connect_entities: function to connect entities with pipes (invoked multiple times, failed due to incorrect arguments or float positions)
*   get_entity: function to get an entity at a specific position (invoked multiple times, failed due to incorrect position object)
*   Important variables:
    *   pump: entity object (type: Entity)
    *   boiler: entity object (type: Entity)
    *   steam_engine: entity object (type: Entity)
    *   offshore_pump: entity object (type: Entity)
    *   small_electric_pole: entity object (type: Entity)
